import React from "react" class Home extends React.Component{ render(){ const{cases}=this.props; console.log("home",cases) return( <>

Corona cases Live Updates World Wide

Country

Total Confirmed

Total Recovered

Total Deaths

New Confirmed

New Recovered

Last Updated

{cases&& <> {cases.map((country)=>( <>

{country.Country}

{country.TotalConfirmed}

{country.TotalRecovered}

{country.TotalDeaths}

{country.NewConfirmed}

{country.NewRecovered}

{country.Date}

))} } ) } } export default Home;
